name: 맥파이
intro:
Magpie is a local craft beer company in Seoul, South Korea.
Brewshop Hours: Tuesday-Sunday, 3-10pm
Basement Hours: Tuesday-Sunday, 5pm-1am

Magpie Brewing is committed to creating the best craft beers possible and growing the culture of craft beer in Korea. We work hard to balance traditional beer styles with innovative recipes and flavors

event.title: ۩۩ I AM ROBOT AND PROUD - SEOUL ۩۩
